description: My locale Ubuntu 11.10 is Chinese simplified.  However, when I run nova, the log message of Chinese simplified is not working. I still have log message in English displayed.
title: Nova localization does not work

comments.content: My locale Ubuntu 11.10 is Chinese simplified.  However, when I run nova, the log message of Chinese simplified is not working. I still have log message in English displayed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~houshengbo

comments.content: This can be resolved by setting correct environment variable of LANGUAGE and LANG since gettext will use them to decide specific domain to be installed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhang-hare
